page.title: 09Llanover 50 years ago
page.content: Miss Jenkins and Mrs Jacobs were girls in the village about 50 years ago.There were not many houses.The playing field was only a field.They went to the old school in the village. There were no school dinners they took sandwiches to eat and water to drink.Children who came from a distance brought sugar and cocoa in a tin.The teacher used to boil water to make their cocoa.They had no music lessons but they did a lot of sewing.They started school at 9 A.M and finished at 3.30pm.When they were 11 they sat an exam to go to the Boy's Grammer school or the Girl's Grammer school.If you failed the exam you had to stay in the village school.There was no eletric light in the houses,they used oil-lamps or candles.
